ThingDef.Name: ZT_ZJSNP
ThingDef.Desc: According to legend, in ancient times, the space between the two realms of Xianfan was not as solid as it is now. An immortal can stay for a few days. On that day, when a certain emperor shelters his son, he falls in love with a woman at first sight. After all, Xianfan is different, even if it can stay for several days. After all, it is impossible to expect long in the world. He turned into a mortal, playing with women around the world. When he was about to leave, he used his own blood and life-long experience to give a precious jade to his woman. Although this thing does not hurt people, it has the power of shelter. But you can protect the master of Yupei from death, and have an extremely valuable learning and insight from an immortal emperor who uses Dan as a path. .by puppet
